alert.note: Alert for Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 08 at 3:01AM AKST until November 09 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys. * WHEN...From noon today to midnight AKST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility to one half mile or less at times. Strong winds over higher terrain will cause significant reduction in visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.
